title: Blood Pressure Notepad
remove_add_subtitle: Advertising is the only source of income for my software. Thank you for your support.
rating_on_googleplay_subtitle: Thank you for your rating and support.
alarm_textfield_emptycontext2: Medication dosage must be greater than 0
bp_screen_pressure_warning: Invalid Input: Systolic pressure should be higher than Diastolic pressure
bp_screen_range_warning: Invalid Input: Systolic or Diastolic value too high
bs_screen_state_warning: Please Select Before Meal or After Meal State
bs_screen_range_warning: Invalid Input: Blood sugar value abnormal
double_check: Do you want to delete this reminder?
fromGallery: Select Photo from Gallery for Identification
ocr_screen_state_warning: Please provide a photo or input the query content
ocr_screen_content_warning: Click the camera icon to take a photo. We will use OCR to find the information about the medication.
disclaimer_content: This application may contain information about certain medical conditions, medical treatments, and product information. Such information is provided for informational purposes only and does not contain advertising or intentions regarding the use of any medication, treatment, or oral product. It is not a substitute for consultation with a doctor or other qualified medical professional. You may not use the information contained herein for medical treatment, health care problem-solving, or disease diagnosis. You must always consult with a doctor or other qualified medical professional. You agree that OkFit will not be liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from your use and/or reliance on the Application Content, products, information, or other information and disclaims all warranties, express or implied, as to the accuracy, currency, and suitability of the Application Content and the products, methods, information, or other materials referenced therein.
bp_screen_helper_content:
We provide two ways to help you record blood pressure:
1. Click the text input box above to use Siri voice recognition to record blood pressure.
2. Manually input by clicking the numbers below.
bp_screen_textfield_title:
Click the microphone icon in the lower right corner of the keyboard to convert speech to text
Example: Say 'Systolic 128, Diastolic 86, Heart Rate 68'
steps_screen_textfield_title:
(English not supported)
Click the microphone icon in the lower right corner of the keyboard to convert speech to text
Example: 'Walked 1000 steps today'
bp_screen_voice_failed_content: No blood pressure information found in your voice input. If you need to use manual input, please clear the content in the input box first
bs_screen_voice_failed_content: No blood sugar information found in your voice input. If you need to use manual input, please clear the content in the input box first
bs_screen_helper_content:
We provide two ways to help you record blood sugar:
1. Click the text input box above to use Siri voice recognition to record blood sugar.
2. Manually input by clicking the numbers below.
bs_screen_textfield_title:
Voice Recognition Record
Click the microphone icon in the lower right corner of the keyboard to convert speech to text
Example: Say 'Fasting blood sugar 5.5'
sleep_screen_textfield_title:
Voice Recognition Record
Click the microphone icon in the lower right corner of the keyboard to convert speech to text
Example: Say 'Slept well today, slept for 3 hours'
quality_air_screen_textfield_title:
Record How You Feel
Click the microphone icon in the lower right corner of the keyboard to convert speech to text
Example: Say 'Slept well today, slept for 3 hours'
